scripts.package-lahiyam-website-dev: cd services/lahiyam-website && serverless package --package target/dev --stage dev -v
scripts.package-lahiyam-website-prod: cd services/lahiyam-website && serverless package --package target/prod --stage prod -v
scripts.package-blog-api-dev: cd services/blog-api && serverless package --package target/dev --stage dev -v
scripts.package-blog-api-prod: cd services/blog-api && serverless package --package target/prod --stage prod -v
scripts.package-lahiyam-website: npm run package-lahiyam-website-dev && npm run package-lahiyam-website-prod
scripts.package-blog-api: npm run package-blog-api-dev && npm run package-blog-api-prod
scripts.package-all: npm run package-lahiyam-website && npm run package-blog-api
